tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We took our child to Dr. Kranthi for a dental filling, and we couldn't be happier with the experience. Dr. Kranthi was incredibly gentle and patient with our little one, explaining each step of the procedure in a way that was reassuring and easy to understand. The office environment was child-friendly, which helped alleviate any anxiety. We are grateful for Dr. Kranthi's expertise and compassionate care. Highly recommended for pediatric dental services!\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went to see this doctor after recommendations from many parents who have got their child's braces done from Dr Kranti. We went for the purpose of getting braces done as my son has some crooked teeth and lot of gaps in between teeth and he is about 13 years old. But to our surprise the doctor asked us questions about our son's sleep quality as he found him to be sleepy and sluggish, which was all true. We have had this issue with him for sometime and we have even shown to well known pediatric neuro etc but no one ever suggested a sleep study to be conducted or a CT of airways etc. From a dentist it was least expected and we actually did the sleep study as recommended by Dr kranti and it turned out that our son has sleep apnea. Dr kranti suggested further investigation with ENT specialist etc , he dint rush us to get the braces done- which he cud have. But he said lets get this sorted out first and braces can be done later. he dint even charge us for the review session. He is a gem and we strongly  recommend him . God bless you doctor

Doctor treated nicely and explained in details I am looking forward to get treatment for my kid

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First of all my sincere apologies to dr Kranthi sir for taking soo long to share my story ..
Secondly my sincere thanx in tonnes to all the parents who have taken their precious time to share their treatment experiences at the clinic because of which I have come to visit one of the best pedodontists I have ever known. Intact the GEM of dentists..
Lemme explain ..this the scenario of the dentists treatment for  a five year old kid 
I was skeptical to visit the clinic in the beginning as I have had many bad experiences for my kid with many other dentists (the way they try to force or scare the child to get the treatment done ..maybe it's their way of treating kids which I'm totally against to , as a dentist myself and as a mother too .).so ultimately I didn't let such weird treatment methods to be applied on my kid for her treatment ..so it's been around two years that I have been searching for a kid friendly dentist who vl not leave a scar of dental treatment being a nightmare in kids and luckily I found Dr.Kranthi sir ..yeah as I told in the beginning I was skeptical at the first visit ...but after he diagnosed the issue of cavities in my kid's mouth  , she was not at all uncomfortable ..he did it with such ease as if my kid and the Dr have been friends for ages ...then coming to the treatment part ..my kid has got deep cavities on her molars(5) for which the pulp therapy and capping was done ..trust me she didn't cry at any appointment regarding the treatment not even the injection scared her (which is hard to believe for many parents out here ..yes it is true ))..yeah for one appointment there was some sleepy mode I guess which made my kid irritable jus a bit but the entire treatment was hassle free and any parent can take their kid regarding dental issues without giving a second thought ..the best part is he never letz any procedure take more than 15mins and that's how his expertise treatment plan will be for sure (which most of the dentists fail to do ) ..I can go on saying for ages ...because as a mother I know what mental trauma I have gone through before finding one good dentist for my kid ...the Dr is bothered about the emotions of the child be it fear or anxiety or stress regarding the dental treatment and he treats accordingly which most people fail to do ..he never suggests unwanted treatments or treatments that are uncomfortable to the child..Its been almost 8months that I got the treatment done for my kid and no complaints since then ..my kid is able to eat anything she wants without fear of dental pain or food getting stuck in the cavities (which were the major concerns before treatment )I can say he is nothing less in caring for your kid just as any parent does for their children 
OK to make it short I vl list out the best of the clinic here for quick view to any parent who are in search of  a good dentist for their kids
-Kid friendly dentist
-Excellent work ethics
-Concerned about kid's health and fear too 
-Least waiting time 
-Least time on dental chair 
-No unnecessary treatment plans 
-Genuine treatment that lasts a lifetime 
-Good staff and well maintained clinic hygiene 

Thank you practice for suggesting this clinic and I wholeheartedly thank the entire team present at the clinic and I can say I can never thank the Dr enough in my life ..üôèThank You  sir Thank You so much ...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ***** ***** ** ** ******* ******* Our experience with him is very good. I was initially little sceptical about comfort of my kid while dental checkup. However, to my surprise, his checkup room is very children friendly with all toys around, and a good tv on the top to get kids attention. Doctor talked to kid for 5mins to attain his comfort, and then slowly convinced him to have his teeth cleaned, he switched on his favorite tv show on screen and kid is really really comfortable. Within minutes he completed his treatment. The treatment is just perfect and quick enough. I can strongly recommend this doctor. They maintained good hygiene for covid, which I am impressed by.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cavities,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Removal of impacted/buried Tooth,
review: I have consulted Dr Kranthi Kumar Reddy for my daughters dental issues,  she was about 4.5 years of age. In our first visit Dr Kranthi sir explained clearly about my kids dental condition and treatment plan. She underwent RCT for 4 teeth and Extraction of damaged for 2 teeth. And also had a few cavity fillings. The doctor's interaction with my kid is very friendly and he makes my kid feel comfortable. We had 5 or 6 sittings for her treatment. The best thing is, she never cried or she never said no to any of our visits. I really thank Dr Kranthi Kumar for treating my kids dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent experience...undoubtedly a wonderful Pedodontist with loads of patience...may sky be the limit for Dr Kranthi...God bless!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Visited the clinic for my daughter's multiple cavities. Doctor examined her and told me the recommended treatment - baby root canal in one tooth, tooth extraction of a cavity, spoiled teeth, and fixing of a dental space maintainer. Naturally, I was really apprehensive of how things would go. But Dr. Kranti explained the process to me very nicely and eased my fear. Treatment (which was done in multiple sittings) went just perfect and quick. He ensured the process is both pain and stress free. They have a process of rewarding the kid after each treatment, which excites my daughter for the next visit.Then comes the post treatment care, which was my responsibility and I was stressing on that too. To my surprise, there was no down time. My daughter was doing perfectly normal even after the anesthesia wore off. His team also keeps tabs on how things are the next day. Thank you so much for a stress free experience.

review: Three words to describe Dr Kranthi - Concise, Precise and Humble. He doesn't tell you many things to do for sure, just the exact minimum treatment required. I was really looking for such kind of tooth doctor in Hyderabad and I hope i have found that. However, I will be visiting him more in coming weeks for my kids cavity issue. Will share more feedback then. Thanks.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor did not do any treatment in the first visit. Asked to come back later. Slots are not friendly to school going kids. Paid fees, but problem not addressed. Did not find this a professional experience.
reply_text:
Dear madam,,, we are very sorry for your disappointment. But let me make few things clear that we don‚Äôt jump into treatments right in the first appointment especially for very young children or somebody coming to the dentist for the first time in their life time. This makes the child open up and become familiar with us and the surroundings which will help them in undergoing the treatments in a better way.
Regarding the school timings, we treat almost 25-30 children in a day and it is literally impossible to accommodate everyone in the evening after 5 pm or in the weekends . So we try to accommodate older children above 6 (for whom we don‚Äôt want them to miss their classes) after the school hours and for very young children we would like to schedule them in the mornings when they are fresh and energetic which makes them go through the treatments in comfortable way.
Hope you understand this and wish all the very best for your 4 year old.

review: Unconvincing treatment suggested.  I do not want to provide details as It does not matter.  People who go, can take treatment if they feel is right.  I somehow did not feel right.
reply_text:
Dear sir, really appreciate your  feedback. I strongly feel the treatment strategies and observations that are made for your child are in the best interests of your child according to the best of my knowledge. I always suggest what I do for my own child. You are more than welcome to come and discuss again if you want to clarify certain things or better have a second opinion.Wish you all the best .
Thanks
